proceduralBanks.title: Photon Radiation Path Through a Linear Accelerator

steps.description: Electron gun
steps.explanation: Produces the initial electrons through thermionic emission

steps.description: Waveguide
steps.explanation: Accelerates electrons to high energies using microwave fields

steps.description: Bending magnet (270°)
steps.explanation: Changes the direction of the electron beam to aim at the target

steps.description: Target
steps.explanation: Converts electron energy to photon energy through bremsstrahlung

steps.description: Primary collimator
steps.explanation: Creates the initial beam shape and removes off-axis radiation

steps.description: Flattening filter
steps.explanation: Shapes the beam profile to create a more uniform dose distribution

steps.description: Secondary collimators (jaws)
steps.explanation: Define the rectangular field size

steps.description: Multileaf collimator (MLC)
steps.explanation: Creates complex field shapes by independent leaf movements

steps.description: Verify beam quality (PDD10/PDD20 ratio or TPR20/10)
steps.explanation: Establishes the beam energy characteristics

steps.description: Measure depth doses and profiles at multiple depths
steps.explanation: Characterizes beam behavior in water

steps.description: Measure output factors for various field sizes
steps.explanation: Determines how output changes with field dimensions

steps.description: Set absolute dose calibration
steps.explanation: Establishes the dose per monitor unit under reference conditions

steps.description: Configure beam model in treatment planning system
steps.explanation: Creates a computational model matching measured data

steps.description: Perform independent verification measurements
steps.explanation: Validates the accuracy of the commissioned beam model

steps.description: Position patient according to setup marks
steps.explanation: Initial alignment based on skin marks or tattoos

steps.description: Acquire cone-beam CT
steps.explanation: 3D imaging of patient in treatment position

steps.description: Perform automatic registration between CBCT and planning CT
steps.explanation: Computer algorithm aligns treatment and reference images

steps.description: Verify correct alignment with manual review
steps.explanation: Human validation of the automatic registration

steps.description: Apply couch shift to align patient properly
steps.explanation: Adjust patient position based on registration results

steps.description: Deliver treatment
steps.explanation: Administer radiation after proper positioning is confirmed

steps.description: Pause treatment and ensure patient safety
steps.explanation: Primary concern is patient wellbeing

steps.description: Notify medical physicist on duty
steps.explanation: Expert assessment is required

steps.description: Perform output check to verify beam constancy
steps.explanation: Determine if beam parameters are within tolerance

steps.description: Resume treatment if output is within tolerance
steps.explanation: Continue if safety is confirmed

steps.description: Call service engineer if problem persists
steps.explanation: Escalate to technical support if issue cannot be resolved

steps.description: Document the incident in the appropriate log
steps.explanation: Record keeping for quality assurance
